p: Elunchun had 1,918 notified HFRS cases during the study period, with an annual average incidence of 59.69 per 100,000. We observed a peak of HFRS cases in winter (November through January). The monthly mean LST was 1.7 Â°C, and the monthly mean rainfall was 40.5 mm during the study period. Figure 2 shows the temporal variation in climatic variables and the number of cases during the study period.
